description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kcbn","text":"A step-by-step guide on setup process for MongoDB Atlas tailored for data administrators with limited IT knowledge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bgu6p","text":"Create an organization. Select Create a new organization and name your organization with e.g. the name of the institute or the group responsible for data administration. In the Select Cloud Service window, choose MongoDB Atlas and proceed to the next step. In the final step, add additional members by sending invitation emails or proceed by selecting Create Organisation.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24},{"style":"italic","offset":31,"length":25},{"style":"italic","offset":177,"length":20},{"style":"italic","offset":213,"length":13},{"style":"italic","offset":352,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dt3jt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqurs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"436hh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"br502","text":"An organization is used for billing purposes and as a way to organize teams of users and projects. One organization can contain multiple projects. ","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e6ni5","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b955q","text":"Being a team member of the organization is not required for accessing the database.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2as3t","text":"Create a project.  Select New project and name the project. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19},{"style":"italic","offset":26,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k4ie","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"13o3k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ukto","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al825","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nv6b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"162454CCB1F711ED88870A58A9FEAC02","height":133.9272727272727,"id":348264,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwdkb3usp.jpg","shadow":true,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwdib3usp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/kwdjb3usp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwdhb3usp.webp","width":580}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"19mqi","text":"The name of a project should be short and descriptive, particularly when multiple projects exist. We recommend naming the project after the working group name or the purpose.","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6iurp","text":"","type":"align-justify"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e91sq","text":"Note that the project name is not the same as the database or collection name.","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqp8v","text":"Create a cluster. {"blocks":[{"key":"dra33","text":"Choose a cloud provider and region. Name your cluster in the Cluster Name section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":60,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7394","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bdfrc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ckq73","text":"The server provider and location should be selected based on the preferred data protection policies of the user's country or institution. ","type":"align-justify"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ellup","text":"In the Password Authentication section, enter the name of the user (users can be created for each person accessing the database or for a specific function) and create a password. The password can either be autogenerated or entered manually.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":7,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36p0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jed2","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9gdaf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"57cg5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"av88t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B7B07000AD1711ED8B39BF4CF92A52E5","height":508,"id":348280,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"7.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwd4b3usp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwd2b3usp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/kwd3b3usp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwdzb3usp.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2gb90","text":"After creating the account, remember to copy the credentials as the passwords will be hidden for security reasons.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25m0r","text":"In the Database User Privileges section assign roles to the user,  you can use pre-prepared template roles such as Admin, Read/Write, and Read from the Built-in Role section. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":3,"length":28},{"style":"italic","offset":152,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u4ac","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gh07","text":"If there are multiple databases or collections, you can assign roles to specific elements of the cluster to fine-tune access in the Specific Privileges section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":132,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flv4e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41sb1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"gkm4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bn2c6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lia6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"04D239E0AD1811ED8B39BF4CF92A52E5","height":508,"id":348284,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"8.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwd8b3usp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwd6b3usp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/kwd7b3usp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/kwd5b3usp.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"81j73","text":"To ensure security and stability, we recommend creating at least one user for each Built-in Role.
